main.name: I'm Devansh singh
main.description: currently employed by Vinove services where I Play with data, push UI pixels, and create Logics.
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for online Websites, and a passion for coding.I work as a full stack developer for Vinove services, alongside my many ongoing projects. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. I love to travel and lead a fairly nomadic lifestyle.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.degree: Masters of Technology in Computer Science And Engineering

work.description: As a Frontend and Backend Developer, I led the creation of an advanced online platform for the global real estate market. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies such as Next.js, Node.js, Material UI, Express, MongoDB, Azure, Vercel, MapBox, PayPal, Stripe, Twilio, and AI through OpenAI APIs, I ensured a secure and user-friendly marketplace experience. The platform streamlined the process of buying, selling, and surveying houses worldwide, providing a seamless and efficient environment for transactions.
work.title: Frontend and backend developer
work.years: Next.js, Node.js, Material UI, Express, MongoDB, Azure, Vercel, MapBox, PayPal, Stripe, Twilio, AI (openAi api’s)

work.description: As a developer, I contributed to creating ImpressApp—a powerful and user-friendly app for crafting professional emails effortlessly. Leveraging Next.js, Material UI, CSS, and OpenAI APIs, I ensured a seamless and personalized email experience for users. The app's simplicity, efficiency, and effectiveness make it a game-changer in the realm of email communication.
work.title: Frontend developer
work.years: Next.js, Material UI, CSS, AI (openAi api’s)

work.description: Lookseas is an online platform designed to facilitate the buying, selling, and subscription of surveys for boats worldwide. It is a marketplace where boat owners and enthusiasts can list their vessels and buyers can browse and purchase boats of all types and sizes. The platform is updated regularly to ensure that users have access to the latest listings and information. Lookseas is a community of boat owners and enthusiasts who come together to transact in a safe and secure environment.
work.title: Frontend and backend development
work.years: Next js, nodejs,material ui,express,mongodb,azure,vercel, MapBox, Paypal , twillio

work.description: Go-regi.com is an idea that originated from the USA and builds in India, It is a way to connect global merchants and customers worldwide. Go-regi has helped businesses improve their efficiency through streamlining the production and service delivery process.It enables new and existing businesses to venture into the market and reach potential customers without the need for a physical presence. This way, business organizations can create products, avail themselves on their websites and other electronic portals, and make sales through online transactions, a move that is only possible through electronic commerce. All in all, the importance of electronic commerce in the marketplace cannot be overstated, as it has revolutionized the way of doing business.
work.title: Frontend and backend development

testimonials.text: Devansh is an excellent resource, and a master at embedded programming. He makes sure all the deadlines meet and that also with the highest standards. He is a hardworking and dedicated person who will complete projects in a given time frame. I would recommend and endorse devansh.

I have had the opportunity to work with Devansh on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Devansh excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
